page.title: 03LOCHALSH SCHOOL
page.content: My name is Heather MacLeod.I am nine. I live at Balmacara Square and I go to Lochalsh Primary School, Auchtertyre. I started school at the age of four. We have two teachers . One teaches P1,2and 3 in a portakabin in the play ground and the other P4,5,6and 7 in the old building. We get Maths, English, Writing, Reading and Environmental Studies. Music, Art,Gaelic and P.E.are taught by visiting teachers. The P.E. teacher also teaches swimming in a portable pool. My favourite subject is Art. My favourite song is "Glencoe". My big brother has just left Plockton High School. The Police are coming to give us cycling lessons before we sit our cycling proficiency test.
